com.nokia.places.media

Interface Image

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Content

    public interface Image
extends Content
    This interface represents media images of views and points of interest within a Place.

    Images may be scaled server side and applications are able to request specific maximum sizes of those images to match their UI and bandwidth requirements. the following code retrieves 256 pixel width images and 32 pixel width thumbnails.

     
    
      //Create a request modifier, and specify image dimensions
      Modifier modifier = PlaceFactory.getInstance().createRequestModifier();
      modifier.addImageDimensions(new Integer(256), null);
      modifier.addImageDimensions(new Integer(32), null);
 
    
      // Make the request for a page of media images
    
      ImagePageRequest request = PlaceFactory.getInstance().createImagePageRequest(modifier);
      ImagePage result = request.getImages(placeId);
 
    
      // Discover the keys of the  scaled images requested.
      // and use these keys to obtain the scaled images
      String[] dimensions = result.getItem(0).getDimensions();
      javax.microedition.lcdui.Image thumbnail = result.getItem(0).getScaledImage(dimensions[0]);
      javax.microedition.lcdui.Image largerImage = result.getItem(0).getScaledImage(dimensions[1]);

    See Also:
    Modifier, Editorial, Image, Nokia's RESTful Places API - Media collections

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String[] getDimensions()
      This method retrieves a list of keys for images of the specified dimensions.
      java.lang.String getId()
      This method retrieves an id associated with the image.
      javax.microedition.lcdui.Image getImage()
      This method retrieves a full sized, unmodified bitmap image of the media image.
      javax.microedition.lcdui.Image getScaledImage(java.lang.String dimension)
      This method is used to retrieve a media image scaled to specified dimensions.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.nokia.places.Content

        getAttributionText, getSupplier, getSupplierName, getType, getViaLink

    • Method Detail

      • getImage

        javax.microedition.lcdui.Image getImage()
        This method retrieves a full sized, unmodified bitmap image of the media image.

        Note to achieve server side image scaling, a Modifier must be set on the request for this media image


        Returns:
        A full sized bitmap image
        See Also:
        getScaledImage(java.lang.String)

      • getId

        java.lang.String getId()
        This method retrieves an id associated with the image.
        Returns:
        The identifier

      • getDimensions

        java.lang.String[] getDimensions()
        This method retrieves a list of keys for images of the specified dimensions. Modifier#addImageDimensions()
        Returns:
        An array of objects holding the keys for images of the specified dimensions

      • getScaledImage

        javax.microedition.lcdui.Image getScaledImage(java.lang.String dimension)
        This method is used to retrieve a media image scaled to specified dimensions. The scaling is done server side and therefore removes need for processor intensive calculations on the device.
        Parameters:
        dimension - the key associated with a requested scaled image.
        Returns:
        An scaled version of the raw image.
